org.spongepowered.api.block

Interface BlockProperty<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of property
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlockProperty.BooleanProperty, BlockProperty.DirectionProperty, BlockProperty.EnumProperty<E>, BlockProperty.IntegerProperty

    public interface BlockProperty<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
    Represents a basic data property for a block.

    Properties are facets of BlockStates. They fundamentally allow basic block types to be differentiated. For example, the direction of a stairs block would be one property. More complex data, such as the contents of inventories, are not considered a block property, and are considered block data in Sponge.

    In older versions of Minecraft, block properties were encoded in a block's metadata.

    Not all properties are serialized to disk; they may only exist only during the runtime of the game, which implies that their state are initialized based on their environment.

    See Also:
    Contains a collection of properties
